alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 24 at 3:30AM CST until December 24 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Oconto County, Menominee, Southern Marinette County, Shawano, Langlade, Northern Oconto County, Northern Marinette County, Florence and Forest Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility will result in hazardous travel conditions. Frost could also form on pavement, resulting in icy spots on roads, sidewalks, and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog was rather patchy during the evening, and most prevalent in areas that received snow Thursday morning. The fog is expected to become more widespread overnight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
